quests.title: The Dragon's Lair
quests.description: A complex adventure with multiple paths, choices, and endings. Navigate through the dragon's lair and make crucial decisions that will determine your fate.

nodes.title: The Cave Entrance
nodes.description: You stand before a dark cave entrance. Ancient runes are carved into the stone, and you can hear distant sounds echoing from within. Three paths lie before you: a well-lit tunnel to the left, a narrow passage straight ahead, and a mysterious glowing corridor to the right.

nodes.title: The Illuminated Tunnel
nodes.description: You enter the well-lit tunnel. The walls are covered in glowing crystals that provide a warm, magical light. You can see ancient murals depicting dragons and heroes. A fork in the path appears ahead.

nodes.title: The Narrow Passage
nodes.description: You squeeze through the narrow passage. The air is thick with dust and the sound of your footsteps echoes ominously. You find a hidden chamber with three mysterious artifacts: a glowing sword, a ancient tome, and a crystal orb.

nodes.title: The Glowing Corridor
nodes.description: You step into the glowing corridor. The walls pulse with magical energy, and you feel a strange power coursing through your body. You discover a magical portal that seems to lead deeper into the lair.

nodes.title: Studying the Murals
nodes.description: You carefully study the ancient murals. They tell the story of a great dragon who was once a guardian of the realm, but was corrupted by dark magic. The murals reveal a secret: the dragon can be saved, not destroyed.

nodes.title: Harvesting Crystals
nodes.description: You carefully extract some of the glowing crystals. They pulse with magical energy and seem to respond to your touch. You feel stronger and more attuned to magic.

nodes.title: Taking the Sword
nodes.description: You grasp the glowing sword. It hums with power and seems to recognize you as worthy. The blade glows brighter, and you feel a connection to ancient warriors who once wielded it.

nodes.title: Reading the Tome
nodes.description: You open the ancient tome. The pages are written in an old language, but somehow you can understand it. It contains spells and knowledge about dragons, including a ritual to purify corrupted dragons.

nodes.title: Touching the Orb
nodes.description: You reach out and touch the crystal orb. Visions flood your mind: you see the dragon's past, its corruption, and a way to save it. The orb grants you the ability to see the truth behind illusions.

nodes.title: Entering the Portal
nodes.description: You step through the magical portal. You find yourself in a vast chamber filled with floating islands and streams of pure magic. A voice echoes through the chamber, offering you a choice.

nodes.title: Absorbing Magic
nodes.description: You allow the magical energy to flow through you. Your body glows with power, and you feel connected to the very essence of magic itself. You gain the ability to cast powerful spells.

nodes.title: The Dragon's Chamber
nodes.description: You finally reach the dragon's chamber. A massive, corrupted dragon lies before you, its eyes glowing with dark magic. You can see the pain and suffering in its gaze. How will you approach this final confrontation?

nodes.title: The Dragon's Redemption
nodes.description: Using the knowledge and artifacts you've gathered, you perform the purification ritual. The dragon's corruption fades away, revealing a noble, ancient guardian. The dragon thanks you and grants you the title of 'Dragon Friend' and the power to call upon dragons for aid.

nodes.title: The Epic Battle
nodes.description: You engage in an epic battle with the dragon. Using your weapons and magic, you manage to defeat the corrupted beast. As it falls, the corruption fades, and you realize the dragon was once good. You gain the title of 'Dragon Slayer' and the dragon's hoard.

nodes.title: The Wise Retreat
nodes.description: You realize that the dragon is too powerful and choose to retreat. As you leave, you hear the dragon's voice thanking you for not causing further harm. You gain wisdom and the knowledge that sometimes the bravest choice is to walk away.

quests.title: Echoes of the Moonwell: The Lost Sigil
quests.description: The guild entrusts you with recovering a stolen Moonwell sigil. Retrieve it discreetly to begin restoring the sacred spring.

nodes.title: Summoned to the Moonwell
nodes.description: Guildmistress Serelis unfurls a fading map of the Moonwell. A crucial sigil was stolen by smugglers, and without it the well cannot be sealed. She asks you to track it down in the city of silver tents.

nodes.title: Moonlit Bazaar
nodes.description: The bazaar hums with whispers about the stolen sigil. Lanterns sway overhead while informants barter in half-truths.

nodes.title: Moonlit Archives
nodes.description: Dusty ledgers chart every relic that ever touched the Moonwell. Scholars recall a masked patron who asked too many questions last night.

nodes.title: Shadow Broker's Offer
nodes.description: A veiled broker admits the sigil changed hands. For the right price—or the right leverage—they will reveal the cache.

nodes.title: Paying in Favors
nodes.description: You promise the broker a future favor. They slide an etched shard across the table—coordinates to the sigil's hiding place.

nodes.title: Swift Heist
nodes.description: You stalk the smugglers' roost and slip the sigil free before their sentries can react.

nodes.title: Sigil Recovered
nodes.description: The Moonwell sigil pulses warmly in your grip. Serelis smiles with relief—this is the first step toward healing the sacred spring.

quests.title: Echoes of the Moonwell: Cipher of Tides
quests.description: With the sigil recovered, you must decode the Moonwell's ancient cipher to unlock its protective wards.

nodes.title: Sigil Resonance
nodes.description: The recovered sigil hums against your palm. Its patterns shift like tides—Serelis believes a riddle is woven within.

nodes.title: Hall of Runes
nodes.description: Moonlight spills over rune pillars, each echoing the sigil's glow. Whispered glyphs reveal fragments of the cipher.

nodes.title: Dream Pool
nodes.description: You gaze into the Moonwell's memories. Visions of past guardians repeat the cipher in lilting tones.

nodes.title: Tidal Riddle
nodes.description: Three tidal phrases surface: "Stone that remembers," "Wave that binds," and "Silence that listens." Only one awakens the sigil fully.

nodes.title: Ripple of Doubt
nodes.description: The sigil flickers, rejecting your attempt. Serelis encourages another approach before the resonance fades.

nodes.title: Cipher Completed
nodes.description: The phrase "Silence that listens" settles over the sigil. Wards flare to life, revealing the Moonwell's hidden path forward.

quests.title: Echoes of the Moonwell: Guardian's Passage
quests.description: Lyren, the Moonwell's oracle, must reach the sanctum. Safely escort them through hostile territory.

nodes.title: Oracle's Plea
nodes.description: Lyren grips the awakened sigil. They need your protection to reach the Moonwell and weave the restoration ritual.

nodes.title: Mistwood Trail
nodes.description: You lead Lyren beneath veil-wrapped branches, keeping to the shadows to avoid Tidebinder scouts.

nodes.title: River Road
nodes.description: Taking the open path offers speed, but Lyren clutches the sigil nervously as patrols ripple across the river's surface.

nodes.title: Tidebinder Ambush
nodes.description: Sirens burst from the reeds, aiming to seize Lyren. You must decide how to shield the oracle.

nodes.title: Hold the Line
nodes.description: You form a defensive ring, calling on the sigil's new wards to deflect incoming attacks while Lyren channels protective light.

nodes.title: Break the Ambush
nodes.description: You split the attackers with decisive strikes, buying Lyren time to sprint toward the sanctuary's gate.

nodes.title: Lyren Secured
nodes.description: Breathless but unharmed, Lyren reaches the Moonwell dais. Their gratitude steels you for the final battle to come.

connections.choice_text: Guide Lyren along the shadowed trail

quests.title: Echoes of the Moonwell: Tidebinder's Fall
quests.description: Armed with the sigil and Lyren's guidance, you confront the Tidebinder who corrupted the Moonwell.

nodes.title: Final Approach
nodes.description: Moonlight gathers around you and Lyren. The Tidebinder's lair pulses with stolen energy—you must end this threat.

nodes.title: Scout the Overlook
nodes.description: You survey the Tidebinder's platform from jagged cliffs, mapping patrol routes and weak points.

nodes.title: Moonwell Heart
nodes.description: Within the sanctum the Moonwell churns violently. Lyren braces the sigil while you advance through crashing waves of magic.

nodes.title: Confront the Tidebinder
nodes.description: The Tidebinder towers above the Moonwell, wielding currents like blades. Lyren signals that the sigil is ready to channel.

nodes.title: Sigil Unleashed
nodes.description: You pour the ciphered wards through the sigil. Purifying light binds the Tidebinder, unraveling their stolen power.

nodes.title: Duel of Tides
nodes.description: Steel clashes with tidal force as you trade every ounce of strength with the Tidebinder.

nodes.title: Moonwell Restored
nodes.description: The Tidebinder falls and the Moonwell settles into tranquil glow. Lyren crowns you Moonwell Guardian of the new age.
